title: US Oil Drilling Continues to Flounder
summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States rose by 2 this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Friday, bringing the total rig count in the US to 546 this week, down 36 from this same time last year. title: Glut To Trump Geopolitics to Keep Oil Price around $60 This Year
summary: The global oversupply is set to override geopolitical flare-ups this year, keeping oil prices close to the $60 per barrel mark, the monthly Reuters poll showed on Friday.
